TopicTitle: Did I miss the spaceport announcement?

Articles.Content:
The dev notes was titled "We're going to talk about spaceport" but there wasn't anything in there other than "Wrote up a statement regarding Spaceport that the community will be seeing this week."

Did I miss that statement somewhere?
It was postponed until early next week
Unless I missed it to, no you didn't. I have No idea when it's going to happen.
